mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_center_inventory(f_center_id, f_commodity_id, f_number) VALUES (#{centerId}, #{commodityId}, #{number});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_center_inventory SET f_center_id=#{centerId}, f_commodity_id=#{commodityId}, f_number=#{number} WHERE f_id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.f_id as id, A.f_center_id as centerId, A.f_commodity_id as commodityId, B.f_name as commodityName, A.f_number as number from t_center_inventory A, t_commodity B WHERE A.f_commodity_id=B.f_id
